data.message:
If people really want to get to the bottom of what happened on October 1st this is what needs to happen— there were 22,000 people at this festival, those 22,000 need to get together, get organized, grab as many friends and family as possible,  come up with a date and time to meet on las Vegas blvd, then we all stand hand in hand with locked arms right in front of Mandalay Bay and then we refuse to move and unblock las Vegas blvd until all hotels, casinos, and FBI release all video surveillance footage of The week leading up to and during the 1 October event, if we together as a People shut down las Vegas blvd the sound waves will carry, yes we might all be sprayed with tear gas and ran out of las Vegas but at least then the world will know somthing is majorly wrong with the investigation, I believe this is the only way to bring out the truth and that security footage is the only thing that can tell The truth of what really happened that night, if any one is interested in planning or organizing such an event feel free to contact me and Brain storm 

BTW this just took balls..
